Types

KapsisInputValue = object of CatchableError
Row = seq[Span]
Span = tuple[text: string, fg: ForegroundColor, bg: BackgroundColor,
             indentSize: int]

Prompt a confirmation label that allows only boolean input values as follows: Positive: 1, yes, True, TRUE, YES, Yes, y, Y Negative: 0, no, False, FALSE, NO, No, n, N
